title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
e the lifesaving antidote, we need to mix a bundle of mugwort in a cauldron of theriac, blessed by Silvanus.

Quest Complete Description

We managed to find a cure for the venom Nettie used - but we're still no closer to a cure for the parasite. We rescued Nettie's master, Halsin. Now that he's safe, we don't need to ask Nettie for help - we can go directly to the master druid instead. Nettie was killed before she could help us. We'll need to find another way to cure ourselves. Nettie's dead - s
